Welcome To STATS140XP

Practice of Statistical Consulting

Below are links used in this course

Class Overview

Instructor: Jose Toledo Luna

Discussion: Wednesday 2:00pm - 3:00pm
Office Hours: Thursday 9:00am - 10:00am

Both office hours and discussion will be held online through Zoom

Required Technology

Make sure to sign up or download the following software (in order)

  1. LaTeX

  2. Overleaf: Online \(\LaTeX\) editor

  3. R/R Studio

  4. Quarto: An open-source scientific and technical publishing system

  5. CiteDrive: Online reference manager which integrates well with Quarto and Overleaf

  6. Git and Github: Version control

We will get to this towards the end of the quarter

  1. Netlify: Website hosting service (sign up using Github account)

Resources

  1. Fundamentals of Data Visualization

  2. A Handbook of Statistical Analyses Using R (3rd Edition)

  3. CHOOSING THE CORRECT STATISTICAL TEST IN SAS, STATA, SPSS AND R
